issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Launch Kitchen Sink
2. Run Base UI > Views > Web Views > Local URL
3. Double tap to zoom in and out

Actual Result:
Zooming out causes the screen to flicker and sometimes the screen get cut in half (see attached image)

Expected Result:
Should not flicker on zoom and page size should not change

Tested on:
Nexus S 2.3.2 Titanium SDK version: 1.7.0 (Apr 12 2011 15:24 rcc9dd9e1)
Droid 1 2.2.1 Titanium SDK version: 1.7.0 (Apr 12 2011 15:24 rcc9dd9e1)

{html}
fields.summary: Android: Tapping to zoom in and out causes white flicker and sometime screen get cut in half

comments.body: Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
